events.name: Upcoming PVP tournament!
events.desc:
View details and register in the community server! Link below!

https://discord.gg/HwYME4Vwj9

events.name: Colosseum Event
events.desc: Take a brief tour of the Orre region and find a special 'Pure' Celebi!

events.name: Dance Party in Orre Event
events.desc: Put on your dancing shoes and tango with Miror B and his Ludicolo! Afterwards, take a relaxing break at the PokeSpot and catch a special extra 'cool' Ludicolo of your own!

events.name: Rainbow Mirage Island Appears
events.desc: To celebrate pride month, take a trip to Rainbow Mirage Island and catch a Pridetales!

events.name: Galarian Starters are here!
events.desc: Long overdue, the Galarian starters are here!

events.name: Pokemon Unite Celebration!
events.desc: Celebrating the release of Pokemon Unite, take a quick journey over to the Unite region and catch some special Pokemon!

events.name: Mewtwo Strikes Back!
events.desc: Shadow Mewtwo and Armored Mewtwo have been spotted in the Kanto region! Take a trip to Cinnabar Island and try to find these two rare Pokemon!

events.name: Journey to Hisui!
events.desc: Take a brief trip to the past of the Sinnoh region when it was known as the Hisui region! Catch some ancient Pokemon and meet other adventurers!

events.name: Galarian Pokemon are here!
events.desc: Take a trip to the Galar region and catch all the (non-legendary) gen 8 Pokemon!

events.name: Get in the Holiday Spirit!
events.desc: Take a trip to the winter wonderland of Snowpoint City!
